title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When trying to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button (when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the 'cancellable' parameter).
OB: When clicking the cancel button in the progress dialog while trying to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately and the exception list still comes up.
EB: When clicking the cancel button in the progress dialog while trying to add an exception breakpoint, the process should be canceled and the exception list should not be displayed.
SR:
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 
2) Click the J! button to add an exception. 
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
